constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 37 (Friday, February 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BEATTY:
H.R. 1395.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 of the United States
Constitution which grants Congress the power to regulate
Commerce with foreign Nations, and among the several States,
and with the Indian Tribe
[Page H859]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Housing Financial Literacy Act of 2021
